## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                              | Type                                      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `option` | `option`  | When set to `basic`, the content will fill the whole space of the block. | `"basic" \| "card" \| "fill" \| "widget"` | `undefined` |
